DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see use misoprostol ( medication soften cervix ) place intrauterine device contraception reduces pain woman never deliver baby .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator intend conduct randomize double blind study Oregon Health Science University Planned Parenthood Columbia Willamette . Subjects approach decide get intrauterine . When participant return intrauterine device placement , 90 minute prior procedure half receive misoprostol half receive placebo . The subject ask rate level pain specific point insertion . Providers ask mark whether additional dilation require well perceived ease intrauterine device placement .
DOC.criteria: Nulliparous woman ( define without history pregnancy , despite outcome , beyond 20 week gestation ) Ages 1845 Seeking longterm reversible contraception intrauterine device ( either Mirena Paraguard ) OHSU Center Women 's Health Planned Parenthood Columbia Willamette Pregnancy occur less 6 week time presentation History prior intrauterine device placement History Mullerian tract anomaly History uterine surgery Allergy intolerance misoprostol prostaglandin Pelvic inflammatory disease ( current within past 3 month ) Sexually transmit disease ( current ) Puerperal postabortion sepsis ( current within past 3 month ) Purulent cervicitis ( current ) Undiagnosed abnormal vaginal bleeding Malignancy genital tract Known uterine anomaly fibroid distort cavity way incompatible intrauterine device insertion Allergy component intrauterine device Wilson 's disease ( copper contain intrauterine device )
